algorithm_technique: Finding min/max and applying range adjustment
problem_summary_simple: Minimize the difference between the max and min elements of an array by adding/subtracting k.
problem_summary_technical: The minimum range is achieved by bringing the minimum element up by k and the maximum element down by k.
key_insights: The goal is to minimize the difference between the maximum and minimum elements.
By adding k to the minimum and subtracting k from the maximum, we attempt to make them equal.
If the adjusted minimum exceeds the adjusted maximum, the range becomes 0.
